home.title: Fair Decision Making
home.description: Quadratic Voting is a mechanism where the cost of voting for each option equals the square of the number of votes. It reflects the opinions of those with strong preferences while balancing diverse opinions.

qv.title: Quadratic Voting Mechanism
qv.description: 1 vote = 1 credit, 2 votes = 4 credits, 3 votes = 9 credits... You can cast more votes on important choices, but the cost increases rapidly.

auth.title: Flexible Authentication
auth.description: Choose from individual URL method, Google account, or LINE account. Smooth voting experience with authentication methods tailored to your needs.

realtime.title: Real-time Results
realtime.description: Voting results are aggregated and displayed in real-time. Visualize results with graphs and export to CSV.

step1.title: Create an Event
step1.description: Set title, period, and authentication method to create an event. No account registration required.

step2.title: Add Options
step2.description: Add voting options. Images and links can also be set.

step3.title: Start Voting
step3.description: Share the event URL to start voting. Results can be viewed in real-time.

create.title: Create a New Voting Event
create.description: Create an event using Quadratic Voting format. Anyone can create one.
create.titlePlaceholder: e.g., Let's decide our team trip destination!
create.customUrlHint: Lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only. Auto-generated if empty.
create.creditsHint: Credits available to each voter. 1 vote = 1 credit, 2 votes = 4 credits (square of votes)
